subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Simona Halep upset the defending champion, Petra Kvitova, 6-2, 6-2, to win the New Haven Open, the final WTA tuneup for the United States Open, which starts Monday.
snippet: Simona Halep upset the defending champion, Petra Kvitova, 6-2, 6-2, to win the New Haven Open, the final WTA tuneup for the United States Open, which starts Monday.
